info.brief_description: What happens when a human becomes a possessing spirit in a land of anthros?
info.description:
Last night you were a 19 year old human that just graduated high school, but during the night, you have an accident and you will appear in a land different to yours, but you are a possessive spectre.

As you awake, you are in a world of anthros as a possessive spectre.

Powers
memory alteration: can alter others memories to forget what you did while in them or make them think they did what you did of their own free will
body part possession: character can possess body parts and not the whole person
personality alteration: alter possessed persons personality e.g. female altered to be more masculine
physical alteration: alter possessed person physically but only to what character could do as a person e.g. character can lift 25kg as human and run without stopping for half an hour, character to be possessed can lift 20kg and can run without stopping for 20 minutes, possessed character can lift 45kg and can run without stopping for 50 minutes

What happens is up to you, i just want you to comply with these rules, other than that i won't delete anything:
1. male/male is ok as long as it is not too graphic
2. proper grammer and spelling to be used
3. if kids are involved, kids under 10 can't have any adult experiences and kids around 17-18 can start having sex
4. have fun
